comment._content:
"Food supplies in South Netherlands, immediately after liberation".
She certainly looks a happy bunny!

comment.author: 98338006@N00
comment._content: beetje verwarrend, 'liberation'en 'post-war' gold voor het zuiden, maar de rest van nederland was nog bezet...

comment.author: 19909418@N05
comment._content:
@mezze:  inderdaad!  Deze foto is van Maart 1945, toen er in de rest van het land nog de hongerwinter heerste.

This is indeed the case, when this photo was taken, in March of 1945, the majority of the Dutch -- in the Northern provinces -- were not liberated yet, and still experiencing the horrific Hunger Winter.   .

comment.author: 37324043@N00
comment._content: If anybody sees free-license images of the Hunger Winter, feel free to upload to Wikipedia Commons and after that message me, I'll put them in the Wikipedia article about the hunger.
